# View HTML templates

Learn how to view HTML templates and their unique IDs through the Zuora UI.

After an HTML template is created and customized, you can view its information, including its ID, through the Zuora UI.

To view an HTML template through the Zuora UI, perform the following steps:

1.  Click your avatar at the top right and navigate to .
2.  On the Manage Invoice, Credit/Debit Memo Templates tab, click the HTML template that you want to view. The selected template is displayed in the online HTML template editor.
3.  In the HTML template editor, click the more options icon ![](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/f6c9dd34-4002-4d95-8f16-3a2e89502f68?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..a2lY1ZACRZG8tSNVm_fKNPFABw8oZrekBzRzQciIPjo) and then click Show ID to view the unique ID of the template.
